function_reachability: Is there a call path from function 'main' to function 'printf'?

loop_reachability: Is it possible that the loop with condition 'i < 3' is never executed?

data_dependency: Is variable 'name (line 3)' used after its definition?
Does the value assigned to 'mat (line 3)' affect subsequent computations?
liveness: Does variable 'i (line 6)' remain in use at the end of function 'print_matrix'?
Is variable 'j (line 8)' live at the end of function 'print_matrix'?
dead_code: Can the statement 'printf("\n\n");' be considered dead code?
